sameAnalysis.part_name: 上述用作副词的词和词组均有"有意地，故意地"之意。
means: deliberately ： 指经过深思熟虑后而行事。
on purpose ： 侧重所作所为具有特殊目的。

sentence.Network_en: It looks as if the blaze was started deliberately.
sentence.Network_cn: 看起来似乎是有人蓄意纵火。

sentence.Network_en: With almost evangelical fervour, Marks warns against deliberately seeking a tan.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎是凭着一股疯狂的热情，马克斯警告人们不要刻意追求晒成一身古铜色。

sentence.Network_en: The police deliberately kept a low profile in most places.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方在大多数地方有意保持低调。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版高中英语必修5单词表_百度知道 ... case n. 情况 deliberately adv. 故意地 sceptical adj. 怀疑的.
AEAS考前冲刺_百度文库 ... worth a. 值得 （二）、副词 deliberately ad. 故意，有意地 deliberately ad. 深思熟虑地，审慎地.
六级核心词汇 - 豆丁网 ... worth a. 值得 97-1-67 deliberately ad. 故意，有意 optimistically ad. 乐观地 00-6-46 地 91-6-48.
考博英语词汇 ... deliberate adj． 深思熟虑的；审慎的 deliberately ad. 审慎地，故意地 denial n． 否定；拒绝相信.

list.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... mature age 成人年龄 mature deliberation 周密考虑 mature groups 成熟群体.
deliberate 熟虑deliberate type 熟虑型deliberation 考虑
deliberate中文 ... 商约 commercial treaty 商酌 deliberate over delay 延期.
Bowling 保龄球_体育英语 ... dead wood 击倒瓶 deliberate foul 故意犯规 deliver 投球.

entry.tran: 故意的;蓄意的;早有计划的
entry.def: If you do something that is deliberate, you planned or decided to do it beforehand, and so it happens on purpose rather than by chance.

example.ex: It has a deliberate policy to introduce world art to Britain...
example.tran: 它在政策上有意识地将世界艺术介绍给英国。

example.ex: Witnesses say the firing was deliberate and sustained.
example.tran: 目击者说枪击是蓄意而且持续的。

entry.tran: 从容的;不慌不忙的;审慎的;小心翼翼的
entry.def: If a movement or action is deliberate, it is done slowly and carefully.

example.ex: His movements were gentle and deliberate.
...stepping with deliberate slowness up the steep paths.
example.tran: 小心翼翼地沿着陡峭的小路慢慢往上走

entry.tran: （尤指作出重大决定前）慎重考虑，仔细思考
entry.def: If you deliberate, you think about something carefully, especially before making a very important decision.

example.ex: She deliberated over the decision for a long time before she made up her mind...
example.tran: 她慎重考虑了好久才下定决心作出这一决定。

example.ex: The six-person jury deliberated about two hours before returning with the verdict...
example.tran: 6人陪审团认真商议了约两个小时后作出了裁定。

means.word_mean: 1. with intention; in an intentional manner;

auth_sentence.content: But he said Bersih's approach was deliberately confrontational.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he said Bersih's approach was deliberately confrontational.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he said Bersih's approach was deliberately confrontational.

auth_sentence.content: Reporters Without Borders said police had deliberately targeted him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reporters Without Borders said police had deliberately targeted him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reporters Without Borders said police had deliberately targeted him.

auth_sentence.content: In this particular conflict they have been deliberately targeted.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this particular conflict they have been deliberately targeted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this particular conflict they have been deliberately targeted.

Sentence.sentence: Were they tuned off because an American had the nerve to instruct Japanese in their own art form or they deliberately tried to signal their rejection of her?

Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.
Obstacles deliberately placed in the creation of music contribute to its success
When performing, he positions his instruments in a way that is deliberately inconvenient, so that switching from guitar to organ mid-song involves a mad dash across the stage.

sentences.en: Are you deliberately trying to hurt me?
sentences.cn: 你是故意要让我难过吗？

sentences.en: All trace of his working-class background was deliberately obscured.
sentences.cn: 他工人阶级出身的所有痕迹都给有意地隐藏起来了。

sentences.en: I believe the house was deliberately set fire to.
sentences.cn: 我认为有人蓄意放火烧这幢房子。

sentences.en: Doctors commented that some patients deliberately prolong their treatment.
sentences.cn: 医生说有些病人故意延长治疗时间。

sentences.en: He felt that he had been deliberately fooled by that man.
sentences.cn: 他当时觉得那个人故意捉弄了他。

sentences.en: He deliberately dressed down for the party.
sentences.cn: 他有意穿便装参加聚会。
